manzils.text: 50|1|Ga fu. Yi zunyan de “gulanjing” mengshi.
50|2|Nandao tamen yin tongzu de jinggao zhe lailin tamen er jingya ma? Bu xindao de renmen shuo:“Zhe shi qi shi!
50|3|Nandao women ji si zhihou, yi bian cheng chentu, hai yao huanyuan ma? Na tai bu jin qinglile.”
50|4|Wo que yi zhidao dadi duiyu tamen de boshi, wo zhe li youyi ben bei baohu de tian jing.
50|5|Tamen fouren yi jiang shi tamen de zhenli, suoyi tamen xianyu hunluan de zhuangtai zhong.
50|6|Nandao tamen meiyou yangshi tianti ma? Wo shi zenyang jianzao ta, dianzhui ta, shi ta meiyou quexian de?
50|7|Wo ceng zhankai dadi, bing jiang xuduo shanyue tou zai shangmian, hai shi ge zhong meili de zhiwu shengzhang chulai,
50|8|wei de shi qifa he jiaohui mei ge guiyi de puren.
50|9|Wo cong tianshang jiangxia jixiang de yushui, jiu jie ta er shengzhang chu xuduo guoshu he wugu,
50|10|bing shengzhang fushu di hai zao shu, ta you leilei de guoshi,
50|11|yong zuo zhong pu de jiyang. Wo jie yushui er shi yi si di difang fuhuo. Siren de fuhuo yeshi zheyang de.
50|12|Zai tamen zhiqian fouren shizhe de ren, you nu ha de zongzu, lan si de jumin, sai mo de ren,
50|13|a de ren, falao, lu te de tongbao,
50|14|conglin de jumin he tu bai de baixing, tongtong dou fourenguo shizhe, guwo suo jinggao de xingfa, shi biran jianglin de.
50|15|Wo ceng yin chuangzao er pijuan ma? Buran, tamen duiyu zaizao, shi zai yihuo zhong de.
50|16|Wo que yi chuangzao ren, wo zhidao ta xinzhong de wangxiang; wo bi ta de mingmai hai jin yu ta.
50|17|Dang zuo zai youbian he zuobian de liang ge jilu de tianshi jilu geren de yanxing de shihou,
50|18|ta mei shuo yiju hua, ta mianqian dou you tianshi dangchang jiancha.
50|19|Lin si de hunmi, jiang zhaoshi zhenli. Zhe shi ni yixiang suo taobi de
50|20|haojiao jiang chui xiang, na shi jinggao shixian zhi ri.
50|21|Mei ge ren dou yao daolai, quzhu de tianshi he jianzheng de tianshi, jiang yu ta tongxing.
50|22|Ni que shuhu ci shi, xianzai wo yi jie kai ni de mengbi, suoyi ni jinri de yanguang shi ruili de.
50|23|Ta de huoban jiang shuo:“Zhe zai wo mianqian shi xiancheng de.”
50|24|Ni lia suo yingdang touru huo yu de, shi mei ge gufu zhe, wangu zhe,
50|25|qianlin zhe, guofen zhe, huaiyi zhe,
50|26|yi bie de shenling yu an la tong shou chongbai zhe; ni lia jiang ta touru yanli de xingfa ba!
50|27|Ta de huoban jiang shuo:“Wo de zhu a! Wo meiyou shi ta fangdang, dan ta zi xianyu bu jin qingli de mi wu zhong.”
50|28|Zhujiang shuo:“Nimen buyao zai wo mianqian zhenglun, wo que yi yuxian jinggao nimenle.
50|29|Wo de panci, shi buke biangeng de, wo jue bushi kui wang zhong pu de.”
50|30|Zai na ri, wo jiang dui huo yu shuo:“Ni yi tian manle ma?” Ta jiang shuo:“Hai you zengjia de ma?
50|31|Leyuan jiang bei yi dao jingwei zhe de fujin, li de bu yuan.
50|32|Zhe shi nimen suo bei yingxu de, zhe shi shangci mei ge guiyi de shou li zhe de.
50|33|Mimi jingwei zhiren zhu, qie dai guiyi de xin er lai zhe,
50|34|nimen ping'an di jinru leyuan ba! Zhe shi yong ju kaishi zhi ri.
50|35|Tamen zai leyuan li, jiang you tamen yiyu de; erqie wo zai nali hai you jia ci.
50|36|Zai tamen zhiqian, wo huimiele xuduo bi tamen geng qianghan de shidai! Tamen ceng zai gedi luxing, nandao you she me bi si di difang ma?
50|37|Duiyu you xinling zhe, huo zhuanxin jing ting zhe, ci zhong que youyi zhong jiaoxun.
50|38|Wo zai liu rinei que yi chuangzaole tiandi wanwu, wo meiyou ganjue yidian pijuan.
50|39|Gu ni yingdang renshou tamen suo shuo de lanyan. Zai ri chu riluo zhiqian, ni yingdang zansong ni de zhu;
50|40|zai yejian he koutou hou, ni yingdang zansong ta.
50|41|Ni yingdang qingting, zai hanjiao zhe cong jin chu hanjiao zhi ri,
50|42|zai tamen tingjian baohan zhenli de nahan zhi ri, na shi cong fen zhong chulai zhi ri.
50|43|Wo que shi shi rensheng, shi ren si de, wo que shi zuihou de guisu.
50|44|Zai dadi polie er tamen xunsu zouchu fenmu zhi ri, na jihe de shi duiyu wo shi rongyi de.
50|45|Wo quanzhi tamen suo shuo de lanyan, ni buneng qiangzhi tamen, gu ni yingdang yi “gulanjing” jiaohui weiju wo de jinggao de renmen.
51|1|Shi yi bozhong zhe,
51|2|zaizhong zhe,
51|3|piaoliu zhe,
51|4|fenpei zhe,
51|5|jinggao nimen de shi que shi zhenshi de,
51|6|baoying que shi yao fasheng de.
51|7|Yi you guidao de zhu tian mengshi,
51|8|nimen que shi ge zhi yi shuo de,
51|9|yuan bei zu'e zhe, jiang bei zu'e,(er bude daoda ta).
51|10|Yuan changchang shuohuang zhe bei qi jue!
51|11|Tamen jinchen zai yumei zhi zhong, tamen shi hun kui de.
51|12|Tamen wen baoying ri zai shenme shihou,
51|13|na shi tamen zai huoxingshang shouxing zhi ri.
51|14|Nimen changshi nimen de xingfa ba! Zhe jiushi nimen yaoqiu zaori shixian de.
51|15|Jingwei de renmen biding zai xuduo leyuan zhong, zai xuduo quanyuan pan,
51|16|jieshou tamen de zhu suo shangci de. Tamen zai shengqian que shi xing shan de,
51|17|tamen zai yejian zhi shaoshao shui yixia,
51|18|tamen zai liming shi xiang zhu qiurao,
51|19|tamen de caichan zhong, you qigai he pinmin de quanli.
51|20|Duiyu duxin de renmen, da dishang you xuduo jixiang;
51|21|zai nimen zishen zhong yeyou xuduo jixiang, nandao nimen kan bujian ma?
51|22|Zai tianshang, you nimen de jiyang, yeyou yingxu nimen de shangfa.
51|23|Yi tiandi de zhu mengshi, zhe que shi zhenshi de, youru nimen neng shuohua yiyang.
51|24|Guanyu yi bo la xin de shou youdai de binke de gushi, yi lailin nile ma?
51|25|Dangshi, tamen jinqu jian ta, tamen shuo:“Zhu ni ping'an!” Ta shuo:“Zhu nimen ping'an!” Ta xiang zhexie shi sheng ke.
51|26|Yushi ta qiaoqiao de zou dao ta de jiashu nali, na lai yitou fei nen de niudu,
51|27|ta ba na niudu song dao keren mianqian, shuo: Nimen zenme bu chi ne!
51|28|Ta wei tamen er xinhuai kongju. Tamen shuo:“Ni buyao kongju.” Tamen yi yige you xueshi de ertong xiang ta baoxi.
51|29|Ta de nuren bian hanjiaozhe zou lai, ta da ziji de lian, shuo:“Wo shi yige buneng shengyu de lao fu ren.”
51|30|Tamen shuo:“Ni de zhu shi zheyang shuo de, ta que shi zhi rui de, que shi quanzhi de.”
51|31|Ta shuo:“Zhuwei shizhe a! Nimen you she me chaishi ne?”
51|32|Tamen shuo:“Women que yi feng pai qu chengzhi yiqun fanzui de minzhong,
51|33|women jiang yin huimie tamen er jiangxia niantu bian cheng de shitou,
51|34|na shi cong ni de zhu nali wei guofen zhe er fachu de.”
51|35|Wo ba cheng li suoyou de xinshi dou jiule chulai,
51|36|wo zai cheng li zhi faxian yijia guishun zhe.
51|37|Wo ceng zai cheng li liu xia yi zhong jixiang, yibian weiju tongku de xingfa de renmen zuo jianjie.
51|38|Zai mu sa de gushi li yeyou yi zhong jixiang. Dangshi wo ceng paiqian ta daizhe yi jian mingzheng qu jian falao.
51|39|Dan falao yin you shili er beiqi mu sa, ta shuo:“Zhe shi yige shushi, huo shi yige feng ren.”
51|40|Suoyi wo chengzhi ta he ta de jundui, er jiang tamen touru haizhong, ta shi shou zebei de.
51|41|Zai a de ren de gushi li, yeyou yi zhong jixiang. Dangshi, wo ceng shi wuyi de baofeng qu huimie tamen,
51|42|fan jing na baofeng chuiguo de dongxi, wu yi bu bian cheng posui de.
51|43|Zai sai mo de ren de gushi li, yeyou yi zhong jixiang. Dangshi, youren dui tamen shuo:“Nimen zhanshi xiangshou ba!”
51|44|Tamen ceng weikang tamen de zhu de mingling, gu ji lei huimiele tamen, tongshi, tamen yanjian xingfa jianglin,
51|45|tamen wei neng zhan qi, tamen ye wei neng ziwei.
51|46|Yiqian, wo huimiele nu ha de zongzu, tamen que shi beini de minzhong.
51|47|Tian, wo ceng yi wo de da neng jianzao ta, wo que shi da neng de;
51|48|de, wo ceng puzhang ta. Meizai puzhang zhe!
51|49|Wo jiang mei zhong wu zaocheng pei'ou, yibian nimen juewu.
51|50|Ni shuo:“Nimen yingdang tao gui an la, wo duiyu nimen que shi yige tanshuai de jinggao zhe.
51|51|Nimen buyao yi bie de shenling yu an la tong shou chongbai, wo duiyu nimen que shi yige tanshuai de jinggao zhe.”
51|52|Tamen yiqian de ge minzu ye xiang zheyang, mei you yige shizhe lailin tamen, tamen jiu shuo:“Ta shi yige shushi, huo shi yige feng ren.”
51|53|Nandao tamen ceng yi ci hua huxiang zhufu ma? Buran, tamen dou shi beini de minzhong.
51|54|Ni yingdang tuibi tamen, ni jue bushi shou zebei de.
51|55|Ni yingdang jiaohui zhongren, yinwei jiaohui duiyu xinshi que shi youyi de.
51|56|Wo chuangzao jingling he renlei, zhi wei yao tamen chongbai wo.
51|57|Wo bu wang tamen de gongji, wo ye bu wang tamen de fengyang.
51|58|An la que shi gongji wanwu de, que shi you quanli de, que shi jianding de.
51|59|Bu yi de renmen. He tamen de pengyou yiyang, bidei yi fen xingfa, suoyi jiao tamen buyao cuicu wo.
51|60|Shang zai bu xindao de renmen! Dang tamen bei jinggao de rizi lailin de shihou.
52|1|Yi shanyue mengshi,
52|2|yi tian jing zhi shu
52|3|xie yu zhankai de pizhi zhe mengshi,
52|4|yi zhong tianshi chaojin de tian fang mengshi,
52|5|yi bei sheng qi de cangqiong mengshi,
52|6|yi wangyang de dahai mengshi,
52|7|ni de zhu de xingfa, que shi yao shixian de,
52|8|shi renhe ren buneng dikang de.
52|9|Zai tianti zhendong,
52|10|shanyue shiqu zhi ri,
52|11|zai na ri, shang zai fouren zhenli de renmen,
52|12|ji yi wangyan xiaoqian de renmen!
52|13|Tamen jiang bei touru huo yu.
52|14|Zhe jiushi nimen shengqian suo fouren de huoxing.
52|15|Zhe shi moshu ne? Haishi nimen kan bujian ne?
52|16|Nimen jin huo yu qu ba! Nimen renshou qizhong de xingfa yu fou, sui nimen de fangbian, na duiyu nimen shi yiyang de. Nimen zhi shou ziji xingwei de baochou.
52|17|Jingwei de renmen, biding zai leyuan he enze zhong,
52|18|tamen yin zhu de shangci er kuaile, tamen de zhu shi tamen de mian yu liehuo de xingfa.
52|19|Nimen yin ziji de xingwei er yukuai de chihe ba!
52|20|Tamen kao zai fen lie chengxing de chuangshang, wo jiang yi baixi de, mei mudi nuzi zuo tamen de banlu.
52|21|Ziji xindao, zisun ye genzhe xindao zhe, wo jiang shi tamen de zisun yu tamen tong ji, wo bu jianshao tamen de shangong yi sihao. Mei ren yingdui ziji de xingwei fuze.
52|22|Wo jiang yi tamen suo shihao de shuiguo he roushi gongji tamen,
52|23|tamen zai leyuan zhong hu di (yin) bei, tamen bu yin'er chu e yan, ye bu yin zhi er fanzui e.
52|24|Tamen de tongpu lunliuzhe fushi tamen, naxie tongpu, haoxiang cang zai bang ke li de zhenzhu yiyang.
52|25|Yushi tamen dajia zouxiang qian lai, huxiang tanlun,
52|26|tamen jiang shuo:“Yiqian women wei ziji de jiashu que shi zhanzhanjingjing de,
52|27|dan an la yi shi en yu women, bing shi women de mian yu du feng de xingfa.
52|28|Yiqian women que shi changchang qidao ta, ta que shi ren'ai de, que shi zhi ci de.”
52|29|Ni yingdang jiaohui zhongren, yinwei jie ni de zhu de endian, ni bushi yige zhanbu zhe, ye bushi yige feng ren.
52|30|Buran, tamen shuo:“Ta shi yige shiren, women dengdai ta zaofeng eyun.”
52|31|Ni shuo:” Nimen dengdai ba! Wo que shi yu nimen yitong dengdai de.”
52|32|Nandao tamen de lizhi mingling tamen shuo zhe ju hua ma? Buran, tamen shi fangdang de minzhong.
52|33|Nandao tamen shuo ta ceng niezao ta ma? Buran, qishi shi tamen bu gui xin.
52|34|Jiao tamen zuochu xiang zheyang de wenci lai, ruguo tamen shi shuo shihua de!
52|35|Shi tamen cong wu dao you bei chuangzao chulai ne? Haishi tamen ziji jiushi chuangzao zhe ne?
52|36|Nandao tamen cengjing chuangzao tiandi ma, buran, shi tamen bu quexin an la.
52|37|Shi ni de zhu de kucang gui tamen zhangguan ne? Haishi tamen shi naxie kucang de jiandu ne?
52|38|Nandao tamen youyi jia tianti, keyi deng shangqu qingting ma? Jiao tamen zhong de qingting zhe na yige mingzheng lai ba!
52|39|Nandao an la you nu'er, nimen you erzi ma?
52|40|Nandao ni xiang tamen suoqu baochou, gu tamen wei nashui er danfu tai zhong?
52|41|Nandao tamen neng zhi youxuan, gu neng jiang ta ji zhu xialai?
52|42|Nandao tamen yu yong jimou ma? Buxindao zhe, jiang zi zhong qi ji.
52|43|Nandao chu an la wai, tamen hai you bie de shenling ma? An la shi chao hu tamen suoyong yi pei ta de.”
52|44|Ruguo tamen kanjian tian diao xialai yikuai, tamen jiang shuo:“Zhe shi cheng dui de yuncai.
52|45|Ni ren sui tamen ba! Zhidao tamen zaoyu ziji bei zhen si de rizi.
52|46|Zai na ri, tamen de jimou, duiyu tamen hao wu biyi, tamen ye bu shou yuanzhu.
52|47|Bu yi de renmen, zai na ri zhiqian, biding yao shou yi zhong xingfa, dan tamen daban bu zhidao.
52|48|Ni yingdang renshou ni de zhu de panjue, yinwei ni que shi zai wo de qinyan juangu zhi xia de. Ni qilai de shihou, yingdang zansong ni de zhu;
52|49|zai yejian he zai xingsu moluohou, ni yingdang zansong ta.
53|1|Yi mo luo shi de xingsu mengshi,
53|2|nimen de pengyou, ji bu mi wu, you wei mixin,
53|3|ye wei sui siyu er yan.
53|4|Zhe zhishi tasuo shou de qishi,
53|5|jiaoshou ta de, shi na qiangjian de,
53|6|youli de, gu ta dadao quanmei.
53|7|Ta zai dongfang de zuigao chu,
53|8|ranhou ta jianjian jiejin er jiangdi,
53|9|ta xiangju liang zhanggong de changdu, huo geng jin yixie.
53|10|Ta ba tasuo ying shou qishi, qishi gei ta de puren,
53|11|ta de xin meiyou fouren ta suo jian de.
53|12|Nandao nimen yao wei ta suo jian de er yu ta zhenglun ma?
53|13|Ta que yi jian ta er ci xiajiang,
53|14|zai ji jing de suanzao shu pang,
53|15|na li you guisu de leyuan.
53|16|Dang suanzao shu meng shang yi ceng dongxi de shihou,
53|17|yan wei xie shi, ye wei guofen;
53|18|ta que yi kanjian ta de zhu de yibufen zuida de jixiang.
53|19|Nimen gaosu wo ba! La te he ou sa,
53|20|yiji paihang di san, yeshi zui ci de mo na, zenme shi an la de nu'er ne?
53|21|Nandao nanhai gui nimen, nuhai que gui an la ma?
53|22|Ran'er, zhe shi bu gongping de fenpei.
53|23|Zhexie ouxiang zhishi nimen he nimen de zuxian suoding de mingcheng, an la bing wei jiayi zhengshi, tamen zhishi ping caixiang he siyu. Zhengdao que yi cong tamen de zhu jianglin tamen.
53|24|Nandao ren xiwang shenme jiu you she me?
53|25|Houshi he jinshi, dou shi an la de.
53|26|Tianshang de xuduo tianshi, tamen de shuo qing, hao wu biyi, chufei zai an la xuke tamen wei ta suo yiyu he suo xiyue zhe shuo qing zhihou,
53|27|bu xin houshi de renmen, dique yi nuxing de mingcheng chenghu tianshimen.
53|28|Tamen duiyu na zhong chenghu, jue wu renhe zhishi, tamen zhi ping caixiang; er caixiang duiyu zhenli, que shi hao wu biyi de.
53|29|Ni yingdang bi kai na weibei wo de jiaohui, qie zhi yu xiang jinshi shenghuo zhe;
53|30|na shi tamen de zhishi chengdu. Ni de zhu, que shi quanzhi beili zhengdao zhe de, yeshi quanzhi zunxun zhengdao zhe de.
53|31|Tiandi wanwu dou shi an la de. Ta chuangzao wanwu, yibian ta yi zuo'e zhe de xingwei er baochou tamen, bing yizhi shan de pinji baochou xingshan zhe.

53|32|Yuanli dazui he choushi, dan fan xiao zui zhe, ni de zhu que shi kuanyou de. Dang ta cong dadi chuangzao nimen de shihou, dang nimen shi zai mu fu zhong de tai'er de shihou, ta shi quanzhi nimen de; suoyi nimen buyao zicheng qingbai, ta shi quanzhi jingwei zhe de.
53|33|Ni gaosu wo ba! Weibei zhengdao,
53|34|shaoshao shishe jiu qianlin de ren,
53|35|nandao ta zhidao youxuan, gu ren ziji de xingwei wei zhenli ma?
53|36|Nandao meiyou ren gaosuguo ta mu sa de jingdian,
53|37|he luxing jie ming de yi bo la xin de jingdian zhong suo jizai de shiqing ma?
53|38|Yige fu zui zhe, bu fu bieren de zui.
53|39|Ge ren zhide xiangshou ziji de laoji;
53|40|ta de laoji, jiang bei kanjian,
53|41|ranhou ta jiang shou zui wanquan de baochou.
53|42|Ni de zhu, shi zhongsheng de guisu.
53|43|Ta neng shi ren xiao, neng shi ren ku;
53|44|ta neng shi ren si, neng shi rensheng;
53|45|ta ceng chuangzao pei'ou ──nanxing de yu nuxing de ──
53|46|shi yi shechu de jingye;
53|47|ta yi zaizao wei jiren;
53|48|ta neng shi ren fuzu, neng shi ren manyi;
53|49|ta shi tianlangxing de zhu.
53|50|Ta huimiele gu shi de a de ren,
53|51|he sai mo de ren, er weicengyou suo yiliu;
53|52|yiqian, ta huimiele nu ha de zongzu. Tamen que shi geng bu yi de, que shi geng fangdang de.
53|53|Ta shi na bei dianfu de chengshi fuwang,
53|54|gu fugai de dongxi ceng fugaile na chengshi.
53|55|Ni huaiyi ni de zhu de na yi jian endian ne?
53|56|Zhe shi gu shi di naxie jinggao zhe zhi zhong de yige jinggao zhe.
53|57|Linjin de shijian, yijing linjinle;
53|58|chu an la wai, meiyou neng jieshi ta de.
53|59|Nandao nimen wei zhe xun ci er chayi ma?
53|60|Nimen zenme chaoxiao er bu tongku ne?
53|61|Nimen shi shuhu de.
53|62|Nimen yingdang wei an la er koutou, yingdang chongbai ta.
54|1|Fuhuo shi linjinle, yueliang poliele.
54|2|Ruguo tamen kanjian yi zhong jixiang, tamen jiu tuibi, erqie shuo: Zhe shi yi zhong youli de moshu.
54|3|Tamen fouren ta, erqie shuncong siyu. Mei yi jian shi dou shi queding de.
54|4|Baohan jingjie de xuduo xiaoxi, que yi lailin tamenle,
54|5|na shi ji jingmi de zhihui; dan jinggao shi wuxiao de,
54|6|gu ni yingdang bi kai tamen. Dang zhaohuan zhe zhao ren yu nanshi de rizi,
54|7|tamen bu gan yangshi de you fenmu chulai, haoxiang shi biandi de huangchong;
54|8|dajia yinjing er ben, qunji yu zhaohuan zhe de mianqian. Bu xindao de renmen jiang shuo: Zhe shi yige fannan de rizi!
54|9|Zai tamen zhiqian, nu ha de zongzu fourenguo, tamen fourenguo wo de puren, tamen shuo:“Zhe shi yige feng ren.” Ta ceng bei he chi,
54|10|gu ta qidao ta de zhu shuo:“Wo que shi bei yapo de, qiu ni xiangzhu ba!”
54|11|Wo jiu yi qingzhu de yushui kaile xuduo tianmen,
54|12|wo you shi da dishang de quanyuan yong chu; yushui he quanshui, jiu yi jiding de qingzhuang er huihe.
54|13|Wo shi ta chengzuo zai yi zhi yong muban he dingzi zhizao de chuanshang,
54|14|zai wo de qinyan juangu zhi xia piaoliu, yi baoda bei ren fouren zhe.
54|15|Wo que yi jiang zhe jian shi liu zuo yi zhong jixiang, you jieshou quangao zhe ma?
54|16|Wo de xingfa he jinggao shi zenyang de!
54|17|Wo que yi shi “gulanjing” yiyu ji du, you jieshou quangao de ren ma?
